query:
UPDATE documents SET validationStatus = CASE WHEN isValidated = 1 THEN 'valid' ELSE 'pending' END;
ALTER TABLE documents DROP COLUMN isValidated, DROP COLUMN validationErrors;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Ljv7tUcUqkJWz2.a9fc2ac34f70 --database Q4zKBZCPW5Fmg3HtsHcjY8 --execute UPDATE documents SET validationStatus = CASE WHEN isValidated = 1 THEN 'valid' ELSE 'pending' END;
ALTER TABLE documents DROP COLUMN isValidated, DROP COLUMN validationErrors;
